activities: We perform data processing, cleaning, standardization and verification services on consumer and business name, address and telephone contact information.  We operate as a data processing agent, or "processor on behalf", for companies and organizations in the EU.  We do not store any data for any organizations and work only under written contracts with these organizations.  The information is sent to us, we process it according to their instructions and return it to them.  We currently only work with UK data and intend to self-certify only under the EU program, not the program for Switzerland.
recoursemech: As noted on our privacy policy we have selected the American Arbitration Association's ICDR program.
